description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take Control of Gravity in this lateral thinking Platform game! Use the physics engine to your advantage because you are only limited by your imagination!  - Multiple ways to solve problems. - Unlock secrets to make yourself stronger. - Make your own levels with a fully featured level creator. - Over 40 secrets to find. - Demo exclusive levels - Hours of gameplay.
